name: adaptability

effect.black-2-white-2: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.

short_effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

flavor_text.black-white: Powers up moves of the same type.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Powers up moves of the same type.
